BOT_OWNERS_ONLY.english: this command is only available for administrators of this bot.

COOLDOWN.english: please wait {COOLDOWN} before running this command again.

LANGUAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED.english: AeroBot does not have support for {LANGUAGE} at this time. You can help by checking https://github.com/dheerajpv/aero-bot/blob/master/TRANSLATING.md

CURRENT_LANGUAGE.english: the current language is set to {LANGUAGE}

DISABLED_COMMAND.english: this command is currently disabled in this server.

MISSING_PERMISSION.english: you must have the {PERM} permission to run this command!

MISSING_ROLES.english: you don't have the roles required to run this command!

CANNOT_ENABLE_DISABLE_IN_DMS.english: commands cannot be enabled or disabled in DMs.

CANNOT_CHANGE_REQUIRED_ROLES_IN_DMS.english: cannot set required roles in DMs.

REMOVED_ALL_REQUIRED_ROLES.english: removed all required roles from command {COMMAND}.

ADDED_REQUIRD_ROLES.english: role {ROLE} is now required to run command {COMMAND}

GUILD_ONLY_COMMAND.english: this command can only be used in a server.

NO_REACT_PERMS.english: I don't have permission to add reactions. I need this permission to function properly.

SELECT_A_CATEGORY.english: Please select a command category by reacting with the corresponding emoji of the category
